quoteText:
Since we respect content owner rights, it is Brainly’s policy to respond to alleged infringement notices that comply with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (“DMCA”).

If you believe that your copyrighted work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement and is accessible via the Brainly Services, please notify Brainly’s copyright agent by mail
title: This service will aid you when other users infringe on your copyright

tosdr.case: This service will aid you when other users infringe on your copyright
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "Since we respect content owner rights, it is Brainly’s policy to respond to alleged infringement notices that comply with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (“DMCA”). If you believe that your copyrighted work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement and is accessible via the Brainly Services, please notify Brainly’s copyright agent by mail."
